Case Study¶

The Natural Language Learning world dispatches data; English.


Structural Expectations for Modelling¶

Prior to tokenization, each word of a sentence/paragraph must be tagged.[1]

Frequencies¶









[1]

An architecture’s, pre-trained model’s, token limit and optimal hyperparameters affect the length of an instance’s sentence/paragraph.
